SmartSandwich: A smart toaster that uses AI to detect the type of bread and adjust the toasting time and temperature for the perfect toast every time. It can also detect when you're running low on bread and automatically orders more for you. Confidence Score: 0.8
ToastTeller: A toaster that can also make waffles and grilled cheese sandwiches. It uses a special heating element to cook the sandwiches evenly and quickly. Confidence Score: 0.7

ToastGenie: A toaster that uses a built-in AI assistant to make personalized toast recommendations based on your dietary preferences and nutritional needs. It can also make toast with customizable toppings and flavors. Confidence Score: 0.9

ToastMate: A toaster that can also act as a coffee maker, brewing fresh coffee and tea to go along with your toast. It uses a special heating element to ensure the coffee is always hot and fresh. Confidence Score: 0.8

ToastOasis: A toaster that creates a virtual reality sandwich-making experience, allowing you to choose from a variety of toppings and sauces and watch as your sandwich is created in a virtual environment. Confidence Score: 0.9
